description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(904).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,902,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[904],30]] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {0,902,0,-1},{1,15,901,13530},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 25 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,15,901,13530]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 902*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 28 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
